issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1
The current timeout is set to 120000 ms
[ERROR] :  Emulator failed to start in a timely manner
fields.summary: Cant run on Android Virtual Device.

comments.body:
Hi,

Please provide a test case to reproduce this problem. Also we may need more info address it. 
Please also provide log and diagnostic log which can be found in Help menu.

Regards,
Shuo

Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "*Run apps on Android Virtual Device*" in Appcelerator Studio  on Windows 7 is working fine for me. I tested this using the studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126 and TiSDK 4.1.0 GA
I recommend you [Genymotion|http://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2013/11/genymotion-an-android-emulator-you-can-use/](An Android emulator you can use)
I will mark this ticket as "resolved" since I can't reproduce it. However, feel free to reopen with additional information if you notice otherwise.
Thanks
